description: This file defines the interface 'ZigbeeStatusListener' which includes a single method 'statusChanged'. It appears to be part of a mock Zigbee core testing framework, indicating it is used for listening to status change events related to Zigbee component states.

classes.name: ZigbeeStatusListener
classes.description: An interface for listening to status changes in Zigbee components, with a method 'statusChanged' that notifies when the status (running or not) changes.

methods.name: statusChanged
methods.description: Method invoked to notify that the Zigbee component's status has changed, indicating whether it is now running.
